segments.text: Hi . Are you new in this class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am . I really don't know anyone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My name is Steven . What's your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Bill . How are your lessons going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well . And my favorite subject is Chinese .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer to learn English . In my opinion , English is easier than Chinese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess English has fewer characters .
segments.speaker: S1
